content.body: Section 4.2.4.3 (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/semantics.html#fetching-and-processing-a-resource-from-a-link-element) of the HTML spec references setting the synchronous flag of a fetch request, and links to https://fetch.spec.whatwg.org/#synchronous-flag
However, that section of the fetch spec seems to no longer exist
So I think it may be out of date
Looks like everything else has been updated but we forgot to delete that step. PR welcome!
Sure, will make a PR tomorrow! (It's late here)
